What is OMniLeads
=================

The agent session
into one campaign and can also take calls from one or more in-groups(or inbound queues) at the same
time they are placing/taking outbound calls. ViciDial can function as an ACD, Predictive Dialer and
can do many of the functions of a standard PBX as well. There are hundreds of features and options
available within ViciDial, and they are covered here in this manual.
